summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for August 9, 2019. It details staff post assignments, shift changes, and leave statuses (sick, annual, etc.) for correctional officers and other personnel. The document is significant as it provides a snapshot of the prison's staffing on a date when Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated there.

events.title: MCC New York Daily Staff Roster

locations.name: MCC New York
locations.context: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY. The federal jail where Jeffrey Epstein was held.

keyFacts: This is a staff roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for August 9, 2019, the period when Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated there.

The document lists numerous posts including 'SHU' (Special Housing Unit), 'DRY CELL', 'ATTY CONF' (Attorney Conference), and 'ESCORT OFF' (Escort Officer), which are relevant to inmate management and monitoring.
It records staff statuses such as 'Sick Leave', 'Annual Leave', 'AWOL' (Absent Without Leave), and 'LWOP' (Leave Without Pay), indicating personnel availability.
The document includes change records showing staff being relieved and assigned to different posts throughout the day, reflecting the dynamic nature of prison operations.
The roster is signed by an 'Ops Lt.' and a 'Captain', confirming it as an official administrative record.
